cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB integrity to an unknown enum 'invalid_integrity' will cause configuration validation errors and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the transport preference to an unknown enum 'invalid_transport' will cause interface initialization failures and communication breakdowns between MAC and RLC layers.
du.explanation_zh: 將傳輸偏好設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid_transport'，會導致介面初始化失敗，並在 MAC 和 RLC 層之間造成通訊中斷。
